GSD.description:
ext4: make sure ext4_append() always allocates new block

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit 41ff115b14b60cba980b6207e8917cfb66920e45. For more details please see the references link.
